question: Who are the beneficiaries of ‘Xcelerator Bangalore' (XB) initiative, which was launched recently?
explanation:
The Karnataka Chief Minister BS Yediyurappa launched ‘Xcelerator Bangalore' (XB) initiative. It has been launched to provide support to women-owned micro-businesses.
XB is a curated six-month accelerator programme, jointly organised by UBUNTU Consortium of Women Entrepreneurs' Associations, the Federation of Karnataka Chambers of Commerce and Industry (FKCCI), and Global Alliance for Mass Entrepreneurship (GAME).
